Label: ACE Hourly RTN, GSE and J2000 GCI Attitude direction cosines - E. C. Stone (California Institute of Technology)

DatasetLink.Title: The ACE Science Center  website
DatasetLink.Text: Release notes and other info available at

VariableDescription.Name: RTN_ATT
VariableDescription.LongDescription: ACE s/c attitude, direction cosines in RTN coord.
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     TITLE                           ACE> Attitude Direction cosines
#     PROJECT                         ACE>Advanced Composition Explorer
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Interplanetary Studies
#     SOURCE_NAME                     AC>Advanced Composition Explorer
#     DATA_TYPE                       AT>Attitude
#     DESCRIPTOR                      DEF>Definitive Data
#     DATA_VERSION                    1
#     GENERATED_BY                    ACE Science Center
#     GENERATION_DATE                 20120918
#     LINK_TEXT                       Release notes and other info available at
#     LINK_TITLE                      The ACE Science Center  website
#     HTTP_LINK                       http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/ASC/level2/orbit.html
#     TEXT                            ACE attitude direction cosines (hourly values) in GSE and J2000 GCI coordinate                         
#                                      systems                                                                                               
#     MODS                            Initial Release 09/20/2012
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0327
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 AC_AT_DEF_20120101_V01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  AC_AT_DEF
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      ACE Hourly RTN, GSE and J2000 GCI Attitude direction cosines
#     PI_NAME                         E. C. Stone
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  California Institute of Technology
#     MISSION_GROUP                   ACE
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Ephemeris
#                                     Particles (space)
#                                     Plasma and Solar Wind
#                                     Magnetic Fields (space)
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 1 hour
#     WEB_SITE                        http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/
#     ACKNOWLEDGEMENT                 Please acknowledge the Principal
#                                     Investigator, E. C. Stone of
#                                     Caltech, USA
#     RULES_OF_USE                    See the rules of use available from the ACE
#                                     Science Center at:
#                                     http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/ASC/level2/policy_lvl2.html
#     CDFMAJOR                        COL_MAJOR
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time, beginning of interval
#  2. ACE s/c attitude, direction cosines in RTN coord.
#       NOTES:  ACE s/c attitude, direction cosines in RTN coord.
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Tue May 10 15:33:59 2016
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#       NOTES:  ACE s/c attitude, direction cosines in RTN coord.
#
EPOCH                                    R_RTN                  T_RTN                  N_RTN
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms                                                                      
26-08-1997 00:00:00.000              -0.975260            -0.00261000               0.221050
